stories.title: Now, risks of further isolation are worse than Covid – Matters Of hmbreview.com

stories.text:
I've been learning a new computer language recently, and I'm finding it intriguing. Not yet at the point where I can use it "in anger", but I'm close to the point of choosing it for some of my everyday scripting tasks. It would take longer, but would help me to learn it.

So ...

Would you learn a new language?

What would induce you to do so?
stories.title: Ask HN: When would you learn a new computer language, and why?
Understanding China’s Recent Moves in Its Capital Markets

stories.text: I've got a new job and they offer a $500 work at home allowance. I've already got a good desk, good monitor, good general computer setup (I could probably use a better chair, but I don't think I want to spend for something extreme). Any other suggestions for what to use the funds on?
stories.title: Ask HN: How should I spend $500 work at home allowance?
